con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-Threshold
con:testCase.con:description: Tests thresholds for unknown and not activated msisdn. Excepted no actions and no one created tasks

con:request.name: 10030N_OCS-walletThresholdEventExtNot-MSISDN-Unknown
con:request.con:request:

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE PARAMETERS like '%${#TestCase#MSISDN-Active}%' OR PARAMETERS like '%${#TestCase#MSISDN-InActive}%' OR PARAMETERS like '%${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}%' ORDER BY ID
